AKx.caption: Token Drop Contract Address
AKx.doc: The token drop smart contract address.
AKx.name: token_drop_contract

AKy.caption: Presale Start
AKy.doc: Use a date and time picker to allow the user to choose when the presale will start.
AKy.name: hours_until_presale

AKz.caption: Public Sale Start
AKz.doc: Use a date and time picker to allow the user to choose when the public sale will start. The presale will automatically end when the public starts.
AKz.name: hours_until_public_sale

ALA.caption: Whitelist Addresses
ALA.doc: Please pass in a list of texts from your database, each text will be a wallet address.
ALA.name: whitelist

ALB.caption: Public Sale Price
ALB.doc: The price per token during the public sale phase.
ALB.name: public_sale_price

ALC.caption: Presale Price
ALC.doc: The price per token during the presale phase.
ALC.name: presale_price

ALD.caption: Presale Quantity
ALD.doc: The total amount token that can be claimed by everyone participating in the token drop presale.
ALD.name: presale_quantity

ALI.caption: Currency
ALI.doc: The contract address that the token that will be used to claim this token.
ALI.name: currency

ATn.caption: Public Sale Quantity
ATn.doc: The total amount token that can be claimed by everyone participating in the token drop public sale.
ATn.name: public_quantity

ATo.caption: Whitelist
ATo.doc: If presale is checked yes and whitelist is checked yes, the whitelist will be active for the presale. If presale is checked no and whitelist is checked yes the whitelist will be active for the public sale.
ATo.name: whitelist_y_n

ATp.caption: Presale
ATp.doc: Yes, to have a presale phase before your public mint.
ATp.name: presale
